title: Project Kalm
description: Project Kalm is a browser app that empowers you to feel better about your emotions by allowing you to complete a range of activities based on your current mood.

title: Enviro View
description: Enviro View is a browser app aimed at making more available the data sets provided by the US Government around the carbon footprint of the 50 states.

title: Movie App
description: Movie App is a practice app using Angular and a good demonstration of my skills. Using IMBD's movie API, I display to you a list of recent movies with a genre dropdown.
